body:
Comment 1: 
I cannot reproduce your problem here. That is what I see:

C:\go\path\others\src\github.com\Grovespaz\gojira>go build

C:\go\path\others\src\github.com\Grovespaz\gojira>go test
# github.com/Grovespaz/gojira_test
c:\go\path\others\src\github.com\Grovespaz\gojira\jira_test.go:4: imported and not used:
"github.com/Grovespaz/gojira"
FAIL    github.com/Grovespaz/gojira [build failed]

C:\go\path\others\src\github.com\Grovespaz\gojira>hg -R c:\go\root id
b3caf13d930b tip

As I expect.

Alex
